title.narrative: Beam: Severe Storm Warning Service for Sri Lanka

description.narrative: Severe Storm Warning Service for Sri Lanka is a joint research and development project. The main output of the project is a real time service system based on lightning location data and weather models. The service system provides warnings of approaching th understorms to various platforms (www, mobile apps). The system is tailored so that various user roles can activate the system to receive warnings relevant to their daily life or business.
